article: pope benedict xvi began his visit to turkey on tuesday with appeals for dialogue and `` brotherhood '' between christians and muslims in an attempt to ease anger over his perceived criticism of islam .
abstract: pope sends message of brotherhood to muslims in bid to ease anger
